EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder - Webinar Next Week: Protecting Your QA Documents from Legal Discovery with Steve Wirth
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> Reminder: Complimentary Live Webinar In One Week Anything you Write Will be Used Against You: Protecting Your QA Documents from Legal Discovery Hello {{lead.First Name:default=EMS Professional}}, This is reminder for the upcoming, complimentary live webinar "Anything you Write Will be Used Against You: Protecting Your QA Documents from Legal Discovery" with Steve Wirth presenting. We look forward to having you attend. Invite others who might be interested by sending them the registration link: http://offers.tritech.com/May31Webinar.html <http://offers.tritech.com/May31Webinar.html> Thursday, May 31, 2012
2:00PM ET l 1:00PM CT l Noon MT l 11:00AM PT SPEAKERS:
Steve Wirth - Page, Wolfberg and Wirth
Charlie Barry - TriTech Senior Product Manager Questions? Cheri Lane
Marketing Communications Manager
cheri.lane@tritech.com LOGIN DETAILS You'll need the below information to attend the webinar. JOIN LINK:
http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/fxzrbrk <http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/fxzrbrk>
AUDIO:
Listen through your computer speakers or dial in over the telephone to the toll number shown on your screen after login Trouble logging in?
Call 800.799.4510 to reach the iLinc support team for help
